    • Method Detail

      • item

        default Value.Mutable<ItemStackSnapshot> item()
        Keys.ITEM_STACK_SNAPSHOT

        Note that offering an item other than a ItemTypes.WRITABLE_BOOK or a ItemTypes.WRITTEN_BOOK will result in the lectern not opening when interacted with.

        Returns:
        A snapshot of the book in the lectern.
